title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-6.1 - Changes in circumstances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-6.1 - Changes in circumstances

State Regulations
SSP recipients must provide timely notification to the

Office of any change that may affect eligibility for and/or the amount of their
SSP benefit or SSPNA. Notification will be considered timely if made within 10
days of the change. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-6.1

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
